about_the_game:
Magic Survivor  is an action roguelite where you slay hordes of infected creatures and face Demonic bosses while building your outpost to beecome stronger. You play as Dario, a wanderer lost between dimensions, who finds a little outpost barely surviving an apocalypse that took most of their society. You must venture inside the portal to face the hordes, completing quests and acquiring resources, to build the and expand the outpost. meet new npcs, who wil give you quests, add new abilities and guns to your arsenal in your struggle against Demonic powers.

THOUSANDS OF BUILDS

Magic Survivor gives you the freedom to shape your gameplay with over Active and passive abilities. Choose your active abilities before starting the mission and gather the passives randomly, slowly becoming Powerful in your own way.

DISCOVER NEW ALLIES HIDDEN IN EVERY WORLD.

Through quests or secrets you can find allies that will give you unique quest, unique abilities, unique stories and unique guns.

SURVIVE THE ENDLESS HORDES

Every round more and stronger enemies come to face you. Blood moons might happen, war chiefs might be summoned. For how long can you survive?


EXPAND YOUR OUTPOST

Go into the missions to collect resources to slowly build your city. Every level will give you something new, starting at basic stuff like double barrel shotguns to anti-material rifles or nukes.

ULTIMATE ABILITIES

Every passive you find has one out of three medals. acquire enough of those medals you can buy an Ultimate ability. Those can be a revive, a reaper that hover over you, Nuclear powers, A thunder aura and many others.
